name: On Board Remastered
description: Stein bock games is always improving it's products in order to give a good gaming experience to our customer . We are always listening to our customers to find out what are their needs and wants in their game. We value their opinion since to us it is one of the most important ingredient one can use in order to make a video game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: VIDEO CARD: 1024 x 768 resolution Storage: 128 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
